project.logged_out_title: Sign up to be able to buy shares
project.logged_out_text: By logging in you will join our waiting list for active users. We will notify you once you can buy shares.

comp_advan.title: Why invest with us!
comp_advan.subtitle: Reasons to trust Selective Capital
comp_advan.point1: At Selective Capital, our fully digital investment process ensures that investing has never been easier
comp_advan.point2: While we advise our investors with a holding period that maximize their returns, we also offer the option to sell shares to their investors on our platform, giving you the flexibility and control you need to achieve your financial goals.
comp_advan.point3: Our team of experienced professionals carefully evaluates each investment opportunity to deliver optimal returns with calculated risk. So, you can be sure that your investments are in safe hands with us.

how_works.title: How it works
how_works.subtitle: Steps to gain income with selective capital
how_works.step1_text: Sign up for a Selective Capital account to get access to exclusive investment opportunities in the real estate sector across different countries.
how_works.step2_text: Browse and evaluate the available investment options in our platform, which are managed and evaluated by our team of experienced professionals to ensure maximum returns
how_works.step3_text: Once you have found an investment opportunity that fits your goals and risk tolerance, you can easily invest through our fully digital process, which is designed to be hassle-free, transparent, and efficient.
how_works.step4_text: Track the performance of your investments in real-time through our platform's monitoring tools and regular updates from our team
how_works.step5_text: Whether you choose to hold your investment for the recommended period or sell it to another investor on our platform, the process is quick and hassle-free.
how_works.step6_text: Once you have exited an investment, you can reinvest your funds in new opportunities, or simply withdraw them to your account.
